dcterms:description: A high-resolution TOF-MRA dataset containing 3D images of 11 subjects acquired at 7T, with isotropic resolution of 300 µm and prospective motion correction to prevent image blurring.
dcterms:title: 7T MRA Dataset

dcterms:description: A publicly available dataset containing MRA images collected at 1.5T and 3T, used for evaluating the generalization capabilities of the proposed model.
dcterms:title: IXI Dataset

dcterms:description: An interactive machine learning tool for pixel classification in bioimage analysis, used for semi-automatically segmenting small vessels in the dataset.
